title: Discovery Call

transcript.text: Hey John, thanks for joining today. How are you doing?
I'm doing great, thanks for having me. I've been looking forward to this call.
Awesome! So tell me a bit about your situation. What's been going on?
Well, I've been struggling with my business for a while now. Revenue has been flat and I'm not sure what to do about it. I've tried a few things but nothing seems to stick.
I hear you. That's actually really common. Let me share some strategies that have worked for our other clients.
That sounds great, I'd love to hear about that. What kind of results have they seen?
On average, our clients see a 30% increase in revenue within the first 90 days. Let me walk you through exactly how that works.
Wow, that's impressive. I'm definitely interested. What would that look like for me specifically?

default_summary: Sarah discussed revenue growth strategies with John, who has been struggling with flat revenue. John expressed strong interest in the program after hearing about client results.
